title: testscript_multianimal.py [need to delete the fake project before re-running]
body:
Example: win10, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut 2.x. Please complete the following information about your system: OS: [Windows 10] DeepLabCut Version: [2.2b6] Anaconda env used: 1.9.12 something wrong when run 'ipython testscript_multianimal.py'
Code output

```python [(DLC-GPU) C:\Users\Administrator\DeepLabCut\examples>ipython testscript_multianimal.py Creating project... Project "C:\Users\Administrator\DeepLabCut\examples\multi_mouse-dlc_team-2020-06-18" already exists! Project created. Editing config... --------------------------------------------------------------------------- TypeError Traceback (most recent call last) C:\Users\Administrator\DeepLabCut\examples\testscript_multianimal.py in () 31 print("Editing config...") 32 cfg = auxiliaryfunctions.edit_config( ---> 33 config_path, {"numframes2pick": NUM_FRAMES, "TrainingFraction": [TRAIN_SIZE]} 34 ) 35 print("Config edited.") c:\programdata\anaconda3\envs\dlc-gpu\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\utils\auxiliaryfunctions.py in edit_config(configname, edits, output_name) 233 deeplabcut.auxiliaryfunctions.edit_config(config_path, edits) 234 """ --> 235 cfg = read_plainconfig(configname) 236 for key, value in edits.items(): 237 cfg[key] = value c:\programdata\anaconda3\envs\dlc-gpu\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\utils\auxiliaryfunctions.py in read_plainconfig(configname) 259 260 def read_plainconfig(configname): --> 261 if not os.path.exists(configname): 262 raise FileNotFoundError( 263 f"Config {configname} is not found. Please make sure that the file exists." c:\programdata\anaconda3\envs\dlc-gpu\lib\genericpath.py in exists(path) 17 """Test whether a path exists. Returns False for broken symbolic links""" 18 try: ---> 19 os.stat(path) 20 except OSError: 21 return False TypeError: stat: path should be string, bytes, os.PathLike or integer, not NoneType!]
